entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @NikkiHaley Where are the tests? We are dying out here and you blame everyone except for who's responsible? It is nauseating at what lengths the GOP will go to keep that Russian money flowing. How many deaths are too many before the GOP  does something to protect us? #COVID19 https://t.co/vBp0CGl5S5
